Test Name: HIV-1/HIV-2 Antibody Confirmation and Differentiation, Prenatal, Serum
Purpose: To confirm and differentiate HIV-1 and HIV-2 antibodies in prenatal serum for accurate detection of HIV infection in pregnant women.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: HIV-1/HIV-2 Antibody Differentiation Assay Kit, centrifuge, pipettes, incubator, plate reader
